goblin_gear.title: Goblin Gear
goblin_gear.description: Collect three goblin ears for the quest giver.

scout_tracking.title: Tracking the Scout
scout_tracking.description: Follow the goblin scout's trail to their camp.

purify_token.title: Purify the Token
purify_token.description: Bring Arvalin a goblin insignia and a cracked helmet.
